about_the_game:
Dive into the We Love Fish Tanks demo – a cozy and relaxing sandbox where you can build the aquarium of your dreams - as long as that dream aquarium only has like 5 specific fish in it (because it's the demo). Create, grow, and collect at your own pace with no stress, no consequences, no manipulative game mechanics.

Key Features:

  • Customize Your Tanks: Choose from a variety of backgrounds, wall styles, water colors, and lighting options to design up to 9 fish tanks that are uniquely yours.

  • Fish of All Sizes: Stock your aquarium with fish of different sizes to create a lively and dynamic underwater world.

  • No Limits on Fish: Add as many fish as you want to your tanks—your only limit is how much your computer can handle!

  • Discover and Collect: Breed fish to unlock unique colors and personalities, building a vibrant and curated collection of aquatic life.

  • Stress-Free Fun: With no losing conditions, and no manipulative game mechanics, the game is all about nurturing your fish, chilling out, and watching your creations flourish.

Whether you’re a collector, decorator, or simply someone who loves fish, We Love Fish Tanks is the perfect way to relax and create your own aquatic paradise. Start your journey today and see where your imagination takes you!

For my Pookie Bear <3

name: We Love Fish Tanks Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: We Love Fish Tanks is a cozy aquarium builder. Kick back & relax, buy, breed, & sell fish (or fish-like things), and decorate your tank exactly how you'd like!
